title: Wanton Tom: or, The merry history of Tom Stitch the taylor
publisher: Printed for R. Butler, and sold by Richard Kell, next door to the Sign of the Mytre, in St. Johns-Street,
notes: Caption title on p. 1: The pleasant history of Tom Stitch the taylor.
Imprint in Wing reads: for R. Butler and sold by R. Kell.
On p. 22: The end of the first part.
Leaves A2 and A3 cropped along outer margin with slight loss of text; pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University.
